artist: Artist: Tehri Ekebom , et al.; Printer: AS Ingri, Estonia; Publisher: The Finnish Comics Society, Helsinki
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of a figure wearing an antler cap casting a shadow printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 28 pp.
medium: Letterpress, color offset lithography; bound volume
title: Finnish Comics
